name: Ultimate Brain Games
description: Welcome to the most comprehensive and feature-rich compilation of classic brain challenges ever available for portable gaming. Now you can enjoy Chess, Checkers, Backgammon, Mahjong, Dominoes, 4-in-a-Row, Sink the Ships, and Reversi... while on the go! Pre-set and adjustable computer AI allows multiple challenge levels from beginner to highly advanced for one player modes.
